pullRequest.title: [0256] Refactor Fuel Information Related Vehicle Data
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixes #1223
This PR is [ready] for review.
Risk
This PR makes [minor] API changes.
Testing Plan
Covered by existing and added unit tests
Unit Tests
New unit tests covering introduced structures were added
Summary
Applied 0256 Refactor Fuel Information Related Vehicle Data changes
Changelog
Enhancements

Add CapacityUnit
Refactor Fuel information
Fix tests

CLA

 I have signed the CLA

commit.message:
[0256]
   - Add CapacityUnit
   - Refactor Fuel information
   - Fix tests

[0256]
    - Update tests data after code review
    - Add @Deprecated annotation
    - Fix JavaDoc

[0256]
    - Update tests after code review
    - Change since X.x --> since 6.0

[0256]
    - Rollback formatting changes
    - Change order of methods to make the diff clear
Revert LF to CRLF line separators
Revert LF to CRLF line separators

nodes.bodyText: Suggested change * * Param Name * Type * Description * Required * Version Available * * * type * FuelType * * N * * * * range * Float * The estimate range in KM the vehicle can travel based on fuel level and consumption. * N * * * * level * Float * The relative remaining capacity of this fuel type (percentage). * N * SmartDeviceLink 7.0.0 * * * levelState * ComponentVolumeStatus * The fuel level state * N * SmartDeviceLink 7.0.0 * * * capacity * Float * The absolute capacity of this fuel type. * N * SmartDeviceLink 7.0.0 * * * capacityUnit * CapacityUnit * The unit of the capacity of this fuel type such as liters for gasoline or kWh forbatteries. * N * SmartDeviceLink 7.0.0 * * * @since SmartDeviceLink 5.0.0 * * Param Name * Type * Description * Required * Notes * Version Available * * * type * FuelType * * N * * * * * range * Float * The estimate range in KM the vehicle can travel based on fuel level and consumption. * N * {"num_min_value": 0.0, "num_max_value": 10000.0} * * * * level * Float * The relative remaining capacity of this fuel type (percentage). * N * {"num_min_value": -6.0, "num_max_value": 1000000.0} * SmartDeviceLink 7.0.0 * * * levelState * ComponentVolumeStatus * The fuel level state * N * * SmartDeviceLink 7.0.0 * * * capacity * Float * The absolute capacity of this fuel type. * N * {"num_min_value": 0.0, "num_max_value": 1000000.0} * SmartDeviceLink 7.0.0 * * * capacityUnit * CapacityUnit * The unit of the capacity of this fuel type such as liters for gasoline or kWh forbatteries. * N * * SmartDeviceLink 7.0.0 * * * @since SmartDeviceLink 5.0.0

nodes.bodyText: We added a notes section that will display min and max value if needed to the generator. I added what it should look like above.

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                 * @param level The relative remaining capacity of this fuel type (percentage).
          
          
            
                 * @since SmartDeviceLink 7.0.0
          
          
            
                 * @param level The relative remaining capacity of this fuel type (percentage).
          
          
            
                 * {"num_min_value": -6.0, "num_max_value": 1000000.0}
          
          
            
                 * @since SmartDeviceLink 7.0.0

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                 * @return Float The relative remaining capacity of this fuel type (percentage).
          
          
            
                 * @since SmartDeviceLink 7.0.0
          
          
            
                 * @return Float The relative remaining capacity of this fuel type (percentage).
          
          
            
                 * {"num_min_value": -6.0, "num_max_value": 1000000.0}
          
          
            
                 * @since SmartDeviceLink 7.0.0

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                 * @param capacity The absolute capacity of this fuel type.
          
          
            
                 * @since SmartDeviceLink 7.0.0
          
          
            
                 * @param capacity The absolute capacity of this fuel type.
          
          
            
                 * {"num_min_value": 0.0, "num_max_value": 1000000.0}
          
          
            
                 * @since SmartDeviceLink 7.0.0

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                 * @return Float The absolute capacity of this fuel type.
          
          
            
                 * @since SmartDeviceLink 7.0.0
          
          
            
                 * @return Float The absolute capacity of this fuel type.
          
          
            
                 * {"num_min_value": 0.0, "num_max_value": 1000000.0}
          
          
            
                 * @since SmartDeviceLink 7.0.0
This is not Deprecated in the rpc_spec
This is not Deprecated in the rpc_spec
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -368,6 +392,31 @@ public void setInstantFuelConsumption(Boolean instantFuelConsumption) {
     public Boolean getInstantFuelConsumption() {
         return getBoolean(KEY_INSTANT_FUEL_CONSUMPTION);
     }
+
+    /**
+     * Sets the fuelRange.
+     *
+     * @param fuelRange The fuel type, estimated range in KM, fuel level/capacity and fuel level state for the
+     * vehicle. See struct FuelRange for details.
+     * @since SmartDeviceLink 5.0.0
+     */
+    @Deprecated
+    public void setFuelRange(Boolean fuelRange) {
+        setParameters(KEY_FUEL_RANGE, fuelRange);
+    }
+
+    /**
+     * Gets the fuelRange.
+     *
+     * @return Boolean The fuel type, estimated range in KM, fuel level/capacity and fuel level state for the
+     * vehicle. See struct FuelRange for details.
+     * @since SmartDeviceLink 5.0.0
+     */
+    @Deprecated

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -426,22 +434,23 @@ public Boolean getRpm() {
     }
 
 	/**
-	 * Sets a boolean value. If true, subscribes FuelLevel data
+	 * Sets the fuelLevel.
 	 * 
-	 * @param fuelLevel
-	 *            a boolean value
+	 * @param fuelLevel The fuel level in the tank (percentage). This parameter is deprecated starting RPC Spec
+	 * 7.0, please see fuelRange.
 	 */
+	@Deprecated
     public void setFuelLevel(Boolean fuelLevel) {
 		setParameters(KEY_FUEL_LEVEL, fuelLevel);
     }
 
 	/**
-	 * Gets a boolean value. If true, means the FuelLevel data has been
-	 * subscribed.
+	 * Gets the fuelLevel.
 	 * 
-	 * @return Boolean -a Boolean value. If true, means the FuelLevel data has
-	 *         been subscribed.
+	 * @return Float The fuel level in the tank (percentage). This parameter is deprecated starting RPC Spec
+	 * 7.0, please see fuelRange.
 	 */
+	@Deprecated

nodes.bodyText: Deprecate getter and setter for fuleLevelState below as well
